jobDescription: Bay Area Rodent Construction Solutions specializes in rodent exclusion, cleanup and sanitize, insulation removal and install.  We are looking for people who have experience in general construction repairs and someone that has sales experience. Pest control experience is a plus but not a requirement.  We are looking for the following characteristics in a person:  Team player  Punctual  Reliable  Good communication with others  Eager to learn and grow with the company Work requirements: General construction repairs  Attic and subarea insulation removal and installation  Rodent clean up, removal and sanitation  Working in the attic and crawl space several hours of the day  Training will be provided.  You MUST have good stable work history and references.  You need to have your own reliable transportation to work every day. You will be expected to be at work ONTIME, Monday through Friday.  Valid driver's license in good standing is required.  If you are interested please respond to this post and attach a copy of your resume. You can also fax us a copy of your resume at 408-626-9531 or email us at smbapu@gmail. We will call you to set up an interview.
